desc: Written for experienced web developers, Professional Ajax shows how to combine tried-and-true CSS, XML, and JavaScript technologies into Ajax. This provides web developers with the ability to create more sophisticated and responsive user interfaces and break free from the “click-and-wait” standard that has dominated the web since its introduction.

details.authors: Nicholas C. Zakas, Jeremy McPeak, Joe Fawcett

title: Professional Ajax (Programmer to Programmer)
